Ok

But Dificultly yours characters could open the lava shields and 
escape, 'cause Shivah blocked all access to the shields when 
Darkafate was taken prisioner, so nobody by now can turn down the 
lava shields, juyst shivah.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> I read it, I got it as I was sending this one. How about letting 
Razor Claw
> escape the room and trap Ender? that way we can have a dramatic 
fight. As
> for killing anyone, put up a good fight and we'll see.
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <airly2000@y...>
> To: <nbwrpg@y...>
> Sent: Saturday, October 06, 2001 11:06 PM
> Subject: OOC:others
> 
> 
> > Have you read my last post?
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > > Razor Claw saw the opening and took advantage. He transformed to
> > Wolverine and shot out the door in a blur.
> > >
> > > Bullet saw the mutant comeing out and tried to get in the way. A
> > terrible collision followed which left both bots slideing across 
the
> > floor of the Black Fortress. Bullet forced himself to his feet, 
his
> > temper flared. The former Trainer transformed to bull mode, 
stomped
> > his hoof and readied himself to charge.
> > >
> > > Standing opposite the bull the Wolverine growled ready for a 
fight
> > but the sound of a comm echoed through both systems ending the
> > confrontation.
> > >
> > > "Remember my favor." Blazes voice called through the comm 
getting
> > Bullets attention. "We're near the confrence rooms Silver Scout 
with
> > me and we're getting ready for a suicide assault against where
> > they're holding Foxfingers, you two interested?"
> > >
> > > The silence didn't last long as both the bull and the Wolverine
> > agreed that a suicide mission sounded almost fun.
> > >   ----- Original Message -----
> > >   From: CYBERWOLF4
> > >   To: nbwrpg@y...
> > >   Sent: Sunday, October 07, 2001 1:40 AM
> > >   Subject: others
> > >
> > >
> > >   Blaze and Silver Scout continued wandering back toward Shivahs
> > location when Silver Scout picked up a scent. "Foxfingers?" the 
scent
> > was strong, like he was close. "Kit Kat and Drillbit were with 
him,
> > he's in trouble."
> > >
> > >   The tigress travelling with the wolf transformed to get a 
better
> > whif of what the mutant was smelling. "He's caught, there's 
nothing
> > we can do." she had given up hope of escape. By now her computer
> > access was probably cut off.
> > >
> > >   "We have to save him, I owe my creator that much." the wolf
> > started off in the direction but was quickly stopped.
> > >
> > >   "Then fine, you won't die alone." Even without her computer
> > access she could still help, if she couldn't hack the computer 
then
> > she wasn't worth the function her motherboard was printed 
on. "I'll
> > see what I can do." the tigress transformed back to her bot mode. 
The
> > virus was taking effect eact time she transformed back she could 
feel
> > it impedeing her transformation. Quickly accessing a computer
> > terminal she learned that Razor Claw and Ender were still
> > trapped. "Let's see if I can't cause a little confusion around 
here."
> > soon after the door opened giveing the two bots an escape route.
